short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop at Amazon to Help Build Wells

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Give Water Project browser extension helps you participate in the Give Water Project. It does this in a few different ways.

When you click on the water drop icon in your browser's toolbar you will be presented with a small menu from which you can do the following.

1. Click the "Give Water" button to get to Amazon.com by way of the Give Water Project's affiliate link. This allows shoppers to easily have purchases benefit the Give Water Project found at givewaterproject.org.

2. Click the visit "GWP site" link to go to the Give Water Project homepage.

3. Click on the "Financials" link to see how much money we have accumulated and how much we have donated.

The extension will also display a small black bar at the top of the page whenever you are on an Amazon.com page. This bar serves as a reminder and has a "Give Water" button to make giving easy. Make sure to click the "Give Water" button before making any purchases on Amazon. If you don't want the bar to show then click on the Water Drop icon with your right mouse button and select the options item. You can then turn the reminder bar off by un-checking the box and clicking "Save".
